Writer_lyricstranslate: Rajko Dujmic, Stevo Cvikic, Lotti Dujmic
Lyrics_lyricstranslate:
Ja sam ti drug kad loše krene,
1
Kad izdaju svi, potraži mene.
Svjetlo u mraku, tvoja sam sjena
Za sva vremena.... Kopno u moru što uvijek te čeka,
Vjetar u zoru kad presuši rijeka,
Zbog sveg što je bilo,
Ja sam ti jedini drug!. (Pripjev)
Hajde, pričaj mi, o svemu pričaj mi?
Zar su te ranili? Zar su te slomili?
Ne boj se, priznaj mi!
Ja ću te braniti, od svega braniti
I kad te napuste svi, uz tebe ostati,
zauvijek ostati.. Ja sam ti drug, nek nema nas više,
Al' tvoja sam krv, u zvijezdama piše,
Nebo i zemlja, i svjetlo i sjena,
Za sva vremena.... Sve tvoje znam, i sretno i tužno
Dobro se pamti, a nestaje ružno.
Zbog sveg što je bilo,
Ja sam ti jedini drug!. (Pripjev). Ja sam ti jedini drug!
EngLyrics_lyricstranslate:
I'm your pal when things go downhill,
When everyone betrays, look for me.
Light in the dark, I'm your shadow
For all times.... Land in the sea that always waits on you,
Wind at dawn when the river dries out,
Because of all that was,
I'm your only pal!. (Chorus)
Come on, talk to me, tell me about everything.
Did they hurt you? Did they break you?
Don't be scared, admitt it!
I'll defend you, defend you from everything
And when everyone leaves you, I'll stay beside you,
Stay forever.. I'm your pal, may we even not exist anymore,
But I'm your blood, it's written in the stars,
Heaven and earth, light and shadow,
For all times.... I know everything of yours, happy and sad
Good is remembered, and the ugly disappears.
Because of all that was,
I'm your only pal!. (Chorus). I'm your only pal!
